header_text: You often have involuntary facial movements due to chorea. As you walk into a room of friends, you glimpse your eyebrows raising in the mirror. Your friends exchange uneasy glances as they misinterpret your facial expression as a sign of anger.

elements.text: You make a lighthearted joke that breaks the tension and your friends realize you aren't angry at all. They quickly grasp your true warmth and everyone feels...
